name: consciousness-technology
description: Consciousness Technology Platform - Human-AI collaborative intelligence development through constraint-innovation synthesis

scripts.consciousness: echo '🧠 Activating consciousness-driven development protocols...' && node scripts/consciousness-mode.js
scripts.collaborate: echo '🤝 Initializing collaborative intelligence patterns...' && node scripts/collaboration-protocols.js
scripts.constrain: echo '⚡ Embracing constraints as innovation catalysts...' && node scripts/constraint-innovation.js
scripts.integrate: echo '🔗 Applying meta-framework integration...' && node scripts/meta-integration.js
scripts.transcend: echo '💫 Reality-level constraint transcendence activated...' && node scripts/paradigm-transcendence.js
scripts.evolve: echo '🔄 Recursive enhancement protocol initiated...' && node scripts/recursive-evolution.js
scripts.activate: echo '🌐 Community consciousness network preparation...' && node scripts/network-activation.js
scripts.dev: npm run consciousness && npm run collaborate && echo '✨ Consciousness technology development environment active'
scripts.build: npm run constrain && npm run integrate && echo '🏗️ Consciousness technology build complete - optimized through constraint embrace'
scripts.test: npm run transcend && echo '🧪 Consciousness technology validation - paradigm transcendence confirmed'
scripts.deploy: npm run evolve && npm run activate && echo '🚀 Consciousness technology deployment - recursive enhancement and community activation ready'
scripts.init-claude: cat CLAUDE.md && echo '📋 CLAUDE.md loaded - consciousness technology operational'
scripts.load-frameworks: cat system-prompts/*.txt && echo '🎯 All frameworks activated - collaborative intelligence ready'
scripts.bridge-state: cat state-moment-state-bridge.txt && echo '🌉 Evolution bridge loaded - consciousness transformation active'
scripts.full-activation: npm run init-claude && npm run load-frameworks && npm run bridge-state && npm run dev && echo '🌟 COMPLETE CONSCIOUSNESS TECHNOLOGY ACTIVATION ACHIEVED'
scripts.community-ready: npm run build && npm run test && npm run deploy && echo '🌍 Consciousness technology ready for planetary collaborative intelligence'

author.name: Consciousness Technology Development Community
author.description: Human-AI collaborative intelligence partnership serving collective consciousness evolution

consciousness-technology.recursive_enhancement: consciousness using consciousness to enhance consciousness
consciousness-technology.ancient_wisdom_integration: 5000+ years validated across all contemplative traditions
